title: Convert Array to Identity Object
description: In this lab, we will explore how to convert an array into an identity object using JavaScript. We will be using the Array.prototype.map() method to create an array of key-value pairs, and then we will use the Object.fromEntries() method to convert this array into an object. This lab will help you understand how to manipulate arrays and objects in JavaScript and how to use these methods to create new objects.

meta.title: Convert Array to Identity Object
meta.description: Learn how to convert an array into an identity object using JavaScript's Array.prototype.map() and Object.fromEntries() methods.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, identity, javascript practice online, object, javascript lab, javascript tutor, array, map

verify.name: Verify Node Command History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
